name: Using the search input with the text "covid"
fullName: Using the search input with the text "covid"

steps.name: Given I go to the Hirslanden page
Given I fill the search input with the "covid" term on the Search Engine page
When I click on the search button on the Search Engine page
page load --waiting for new page to load--
Then the text "Covid" should be visible on the result page on the Search Engine page

assert expected **'

        
            Did you mean
            

            
        
        
            
                
                
            
            
            All 72
Service Offerings 3
Centers 5
News & Media 35
Medical Knowledge 1

        
        
            
    
  

    
    
    


        
            
                
                    
                        
                            
                                
                                    
                                        Covid-19 vaccination centres
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/campaign/corona-virus/covid-19-vaccine/vaccination-centres.html
                                
                                    As vaccine availability in Switzerland will steadily increase in the coming weeks and months, it is all the more important to create the necessary conditions now to ensure that the population can be vaccinated and protected in the near future.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Covid-19 / corona - symptoms and treatment
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/disease-patterns/corona-covid-19.html
                                
                                    Covid-19 - Learn more about the risks involved if you become infected with Covid-19 and the prevention and treatment options.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Covid-19 vaccine: questions & answers
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/campaign/corona-virus/covid-19-vaccine.html
                                
                                    A vaccination against Covid-19 will help protect you and contain the pandemic. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Covid information point
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/klinik-st--anna/centers/covid-information-point.html
                                
                                    On this page you will find the latest information relating to Covid-19 and the Lucerne Hirslanden sites.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Corona test centres
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/andreasklinik-cham-zug/campaigns/covid-19-test-centres.html
                                
                                    The Covid-19 test centre in Rotkreuz has been closed. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Financial year 20/21: covid-19: challenges and accelerated transformation
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/media-news/press-releases/financial-year-2020-2021.html
                                
                                    The financial year ended was a challenging one, as the Hirslanden Group confronted the Covid-19 pandemic, continuing to play a key role in close cooperation with authorities and other hospital operators. 
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Current information about the coronavirus
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/campaign/corona-virus.html
                                
                                    Coronavirus - how to protect yourself.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Covid-19: canton of zurich commissions hirslanden with implementing repeat testing
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/media-news/press-releases/canton-zurich-commissions-repeat-testing.html
                                
                                    In the canton of Zurich, companies and organisations can now have their workforce repeatedly tested according to the new system adopted by the Federal Council.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Corona-testcenter
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/salem-spital/centers/corona-testcenter.html
                                
                                    Here you will find current information on the Corona Test Centre of the Salem-Spital in Bern.
                                
                            
                        

                            
                                
                                    
                                        Covid-19: canton of schwyz tasks hirslanden with implenting repeat testing
                                    
                                https://www.hirslanden.ch/en/corporate/media-news/press-releases/canton-schwyz-tasks-hirslanden-implenting-repeat-testing.html
                                
                                    The governing council of the canton of Schwyz has approved the comprehensive implementation of repeat testing in health institutions, companies and schools.
